item.description:
Who are the foolish beings? What does it mean to be a Shin Buddhist? What does it mean to be a human being? According to the Shin tradition of Pure Land Buddhism, we all are. Shin teacher, Mark Unno explains that only by becoming aware of our limited self and embracing our fundamental foolishness can we realize the oneness of all beings and the limitless flow of compassion. inspired by a Tricycle Magazine article, this discussion will look into the depths of the human condition, how we can take ownership of our humanity, and offer a path of optimism from that which is beyond the ego, Other Power. Presented by Daishin Senpai.

Visit our main website  at www.bffct.net for Calendar and more information on our beliefs and practices.

 

p.s. REMINDER - Hosted by the Buddhist Faith Fellowship. Even though just one or two people from Meetup have RSVPed, you can expect 35 - 45 people in attendance.
